path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/Gashpoint Staking Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: Centralization Related Risks
findings.description: Any compromise to the owner's privileged accounts may allow a hacker to take advantage of this authority and manipulate the Gashpoint Staking contract.

findings.title: DDOS attack in stakeNFT and Withdraw and some getters
findings.description: When the for loop is run for a bigger range of values in the stakeNFT, withdraw and some getters then it raises a scenario of DDOS to the system.
